10 10 50 PROCESSES
This is a menu of generated subprocess

Any menu records consists of five parts
1. a subprocess number,
2. a subprocess name,
3. the number of deleted squared  diagrams,
4. the number of calculated squared  diagrams,
5. the number of squared diagrams which is not
 deleted and not yet calculated.

 If you  activate a menu function, the graphic 
image of squared diagrams for the highlighted 
subprocess  will be displayed.
